course_description: In this course, each student will realize an in-depth, self-designed body of work.  The course is critique-only, and rigorously paced.  All photographic technologies are open to use, and all presentational formats, including exhibition, book, and web/DVD.
prerequisites: This course requires FILM 206R and FILM 106 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 5572, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 4-6:30p, Instructor: J. Francisco, Status: Open
